metadata.title: QuickShare P2P - Secure Peer-to-Peer File Sharing
metadata.description: Share files directly between devices without storing data on servers. Fast, secure, and private P2P file transfer.

common.pleaseEnterCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code shown on the sender's device:

home.title: QuickShare P2P
home.heroDescription: Direct peer-to-peer file sharing with no size limits. Your files never touch our servers - completely private and secure.
home.receiveDescription: Get a QR code and connection code that others can use to send you files
home.sendDescription: Scan a QR code, enter a connection code, or use a link to send files
home.featurePrivateDesc: Files are transferred directly between devices. Nothing stored on our servers.
home.featureNoLimitsDesc: Send files of any size. Large videos, documents, archives - anything goes.
home.featureEasyConnectionDesc: Just scan a QR code to connect. No accounts, no apps to download.

send.title: Send Files
send.enterConnectionCode: Enter the connection code shown on the receiver's device
send.shareCodeForVerification: Please share this code with the receiver for verification:
send.verificationCodeSent: ✅ Verification code sent to receiver. Waiting for them to enter it...
send.receiverMustEnterCode: The receiver must enter this code to establish a secure connection
send.multipleFilesSupported: Multiple files supported • No size limit
send.connectionTerminated: The connection has been terminated. Please scan a new QR code to start a new session.

receive.title: Receive Files
receive.askSenderToScan: Ask the sender to scan this QR code or enter the connection code
receive.askSender: Ask the sender to scan this QR code or enter the connection code
receive.shareCodeWithSender: Share this code with the sender to connect manually
receive.shareCode: Share this code with the sender to connect manually
receive.copyLinkDescription: Copy this link to send to the sender
receive.pleaseEnterVerificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code shown on the sender's device:
receive.enterVerificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code shown on the sender's device:
receive.ensuresRightSender: This ensures you're connecting to the right sender
receive.verificationDescription: This ensures you're connecting to the right sender
receive.connectionTerminated: The connection has been terminated. You can start a new session by refreshing.

qrCode.scanWithAnyScanner: Scan with any QR code scanner or camera app

errors.noActiveConnection: No active connection. Please verify the connection first.
errors.verificationFailed: Verification failed - please check the code and try again

logs.lookingUpPeerId: Looking up peer ID from short code
logs.foundPeerId: Found peer ID from short code
logs.receiverReady: Receiver ready, waiting for sender connection
logs.onlyReceiverCanSubmit: Only receiver can submit verification code
